item.title: HandsOnLLM /Hands-On-Large-Language-Models | Jupyter Notebook | 14,710
item.description: Official code repo for the O'Reilly Book - "Hands-On Large Language Models"

item.description: The Cursor for Designers • An Open-Source AI-First Design tool • Visually build, style, and edit your React App with AI

item.title: opf /openproject | Ruby | 11,975
item.description: OpenProject is the leading open source project management software.

item.title: IBM /mcp-context-forge | Python | 1,843
item.description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) Gateway & Registry. Serves as a central management point for tools, resources, and prompts that can be accessed by MCP-compatible LLM applications. Converts REST API endpoints to MCP, composes virtual MCP servers with added security and observability, and converts between protocols (stdio, SSE, Streamable HTTP).
